name: roo-code-rule-library
title: Roo Code Rule Library
description: Stores a library of Roo Code rules, and lets you place them straight into the active VScode folder
author: DonDaws

commands.name: index
commands.title: Roo Code Rule Library
commands.description: Stores a library of Roo Code rules, and lets you place them straight into the active VScode folder

preferences.name: preferredEditor
preferences.title: Preferred VS Code Editor
preferences.description: Select the VS Code editor build you use.

preferences.name: customModesPath
preferences.title: Custom Modes File
preferences.description: Path to the custom_modes.json file. Use '~' for the home directory.

preferences.name: storageDirectory
preferences.title: Storage Directory
preferences.description: Path to the directory where rules.json and tags.json will be stored. Use '~' for the home directory.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
